name: welcome-to-america
description: Simple and supportive app that acts as a one-stop resource for anyone navigating the US immigration process.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server

author: Juan Carlos Muratalla-Sanchez <murataj2@wwu.edu>
